participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Passionate about vintage cars and enjoys discussing music. Friendly and approachable.
participant_1.background: i own two vintage mustangs. my favorite music is country. i like to work on vintage cars. i've two dogs.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and fun-loving with a passion for motorbikes and music. Curious about others and their interests.
participant_2.background: i wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head. my main transportation is my motorbike. i've light skin with big brown eyes. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race.

content.text: Hey! Do you have two dogs? Because I do.
Hi there. I have a parrot. Do you like parrots?
I do not. I like to listen to music.
i wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head and it's awesome to listen to music wearing the helmet! Have you tried it?
